name: Block Dodge (Jessie Jones)
description:
Latest Version Build - 0.7

This is Block Dodge, it is exactly what it says on the title, use your "a" and "d" keys to move from side to side as you accelerate towards obstacles and beat all of the levels to win.

I made the base game from the tutorials on Brackey's Channel so check him out for sure and I wrote the scripts myself as it serves for the best foundation of learning the C# language. It has been a lot of fun so far so stick around for the final build and upcoming patches and updates.

Coming to future updates;

  • Add pause screen
  • Add in option menu for sound
  • Add more levels
  • Add Save States
  • Add Level Select

and More!

Stay Tuned for Version 0.8 coming soon!

I may start DevLogging updates so if you'd like to see how I'm coming along when learning leave a comment.  :)
